nodes.text: Kosh was a type of tea available in the galaxy by 0 BBY. Some Kosh was among the kitchen stores aboard the Death Star battlestation. On one occasion, librarian droid P-RC3 inquired if Human Chief Librarian Atour Riten wanted some tea, offering him a choice of Kosh, Manellan Jasper, and Bluefruit Kintle.
Kosh was mentioned in Death Star, a 2007 novel by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry. It was not revealed which one of the offered types of tea, if any, Riten chose.
